column5: I took Holly over to my son-in-law and daughter's place tonight, they have horses as the neigh...bours (   ). I brought her over to meet them, take a look at the results:  Making Friends     OK, Just a sniff    OH!, there are two!     Don't make any noises....    I think I like you guys.    Wanna Play?     Seriously, wanna play?    I know I do     Aw, you're not so scary after all

LOL HTHM, you do have to be careful though? My neighbors have horses, one year when my dog was young one of them had a foal. When we would go outside for a walk he wanted to go play with the little horse running around, that might not have gone well?  I was out for a walk with my youngest daughter when she was like 5-6, and she has a thing for horses too, so she was petting one of the adult horses thru the fence and I see a pained look on her face, the horse accidentally stepped on her foot! No damage, but she learned to watch when they moved.
For some reason dogs seem to get along with horses. In the barn where my daughter has a horse the dogs roam freely among them..
